## SmithyApiDefinition.bind() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Binds the definition to a SpecRestAPI, substituting provided integrations into the spec JSON.

If an integration is found for a uri without having credentials already in the spec, then will defer to the integration to create a credentials role.

**Signature:**

```typescript
bind(scope: Construct): apigw.ApiDefinitionConfig;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | Construct | should ONLY be a SpecRestAPI, but jsii requires this type to be Construct |

**Returns:**

apigw.ApiDefinitionConfig
